result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Miguel Marquis Gee

records.addlTxt: JusticePoint PreTrial Services DISCHARGE Report dated 10/24/2022; received and filed.

Defendant Miguel Marquis Gee in court.  Attorney Michael B Plaisted in court for Miguel Marquis Gee.  Prosecuting attorney Arthur Kenneth Thexton in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defense requested time to review offer from the State. Case adjourned for Status conference, Branch 30.
Status conference scheduled for November 29, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Justice Point Violation Report forwarded to Judge for review and filed.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Violation Report received and forwarded to Judge for review.

Defendant Miguel Marquis Gee not in court, in custody.  Attorney Michael B Plaisted appeared by video for Miguel Marquis Gee.  Prosecuting attorney Arthur Kenneth Thexton in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Plaisted was recently appointed, has discovery. Case is adjourned in Branch 30.
Status conference scheduled for October 20, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Miguel Marquis Gee not in court, defendant in custody. Attorney Maryann Corea appears on behalf of attorney Sam Obscherning.  Sarah Dahdouh appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for a status conference. Defense filed a motion to withdraw. For reasons placed on the record, Court GRANTS motion. State Public Defender's Office to appoint new counsel.
Case adjourned.  Status conference scheduled for September 19, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

Defendant Miguel Marquis Gee in court with attorney Sam Obscherning.  Defendant Miguel Marquis Gee in custody.  Erika Strebel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for a pre-trial conference. Defense is in receipt of discovery but no offer. Defense requests time to obtain case material and discuss with client.
Case adjourned.  Status conference scheduled for August 9, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.

Defendant Miguel Marquis Gee in court with attorney Sylvan Jaspen.  Defendant Miguel Marquis Gee in custody.  Jack T Eichorst appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Miguel Marquis Gee appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Richards, Branch 30.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION. This hearing may be streamed live on Dacast at the Court's discretion: https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/76b667a0-98a1-69d4-e783-9185dc35fcc1  Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 15, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
